question: Which of the following is not a correct statement regarding caste system prevalent in 18th century India?
option1: Caste system was found only in Hindus, there was no caste system in Muslims
option2: Endogamy and Hierarchical degradation was a distinct feature of caste system
option3: Caste councils and panchayats enforced caste norms
option4: All of above are correct statements
answer: Caste system was found only in Hindus, there was no caste system in Muslims
explanation: The Asharaf / Sharif Muslims consisting of nobles, scholars, priests and army affairs often looked down upon the ajlaf Muslims or the lower class Muslims in a manner similar to the way of the higher-caste Hindus treated the lower-caste Hindus.
